type.markdownDescription:
### How to Index Date Fields For Faceted Search
You can use the Atlas Search `dateFacet` type for indexing date values for [faceting.](https://www.mongodb.com/docs/atlas/atlas-search/facet/#std-label-fts-facet-ref)

Atlas Search only supports [facet](https://www.mongodb.com/docs/atlas/atlas-search/facet/#std-label-fts-facet-ref) queries against fields indexed as the dateFacet type. To perform a normal search also on the same field, you must index the field as type date also.
type.description: Specify this data type for indexing fields of type date for faceting.
